ygData.subject: Re: broken spells, etc
ygData.msgSnippet: Beguile undead makes hunting specs alot easier and alot more mana efficient... I  would love to have charm for fighting the oracle... Charm his guard, Smash
ygData.messageBody:
Beguile undead makes hunting specs alot easier and alot more mana
efficient... I would love to have charm for fighting the oracle... Charm
his guard, Smash oracle, Loot gate...


>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] broken spells, etc
>Date: Sun, 12 Sep 1999 13:14:00 -0400
>
>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
>Verant is going to tweak Screaming Terror so that it's all or nothing which
>will make it a very good spell. As for charm that's fine it's a useless
>spell since it's a low level charm spell, and charm overall is pretty
>useless unless your a enchanter or bard.
>
>Naeeldar
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Tony B <tonyb72@...>
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Date: Sunday, September 12, 1999 12:42 PM
>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] broken spells, etc
>
>
> >From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>
> >
> >wtf? i think necros have the largest percentage of broken and useless
> >spells of any class. not only that, but we have a huge gap in the number
>of
> >quests we can do, and too many items mimic our spells.
> >
> >>BTW, is intensify death really broken. Feel kinda stupid casting it all
>the
> >> time for the last few weeks.
> >
> >then they took away charm and gave us a worthless spell (screaming
>terror),
> >not only is it a 'why go to the train when you can bring the train to
>you'
> >spell, but it only works indoors! at least if it worked outdoors, when
>the
> >wipe failed it wouldnt really be as dangerous.
> >
> >and what were they thinking when they made voice graft? i dont think any
> >class has a more useless spell.
> >
> >oh well, thats my rant =)
> >
> >>Also had a general question about experience and which is better to do.
>Is
> >>it better to solo a yellow spawn every other time it comes up (lets say
> >>alternating with an equal level friend) or group with your friend and
>kill
> >>each one and split the exp?
> >
> >you are better off getting 50% of two kills than 100% of one, there is
>less
> >work involved, and more safety. also, you get some form of grouping
>bonus.
> >
> >belphenor
> >
